summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1624, for the improvement of the northerly section of West Ewing Street, from the east margin of 3rd Avenue West to the west margin of 8th Avenue West, all in the City of Seattle by constructing a 14 foot plank roadway thereon, under Ordinance No. 17254 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
